value:
$WmMPID_ハロラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Halloween19,Face|Friends of justice! Allies of order and
righteousness! Know that I, L'Arachel,
am here...AGAIN!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロドズラ,ch08_13_Dozzla_M_Halloween19,Face|Gwah ha ha! Princess L'Arachel and
I have returned to settle the score!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロヨファ,ch09_13_Lofa_M_Halloween19,Face|We stand a better chance now that
we're all here together!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロイレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Halloween19,Face|Can we hurry? I'm starting to get
hungry again...$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_MF_Pair,Face|Lilina, things are about to get
dangerous. Stay back, all right?$k$p$nMPID_リリーナ|No! I will fight with you, Father!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|The festival this year has all been
so amazing! And there were so many
Heroes in costumes!$k$p$EFace_Pain|But...I still don't have any REAL
ghost friends...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Hah. It is as I said, Sharena: ghosts
are not real. There's never been a
single shred of—$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|B-B-Brother, look! It's...$k$pIt's a ghost!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...Surely it's just your imagination.
Now, come on, let's head back.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|But I want to go meet them! After
all, Commander Anna said they'd
be here... I'll go say hello!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Sharena, wait!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Hello! Are you a ghost? I've been
looking for a ghost friend, you see,
and, well—$k$p$EFace_Pain|H-hey! Oh nooooo!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Sh-Sharena?!$k$p...$k$pAll right. Stay calm... Let's think this
through, $Nu...$k$pIf such a thing as ghosts were real,
we can conclude only that they must
be more powerful than all of Askr.$k$pBut if such a creature has been hiding
itself, the mere rumor of its existence
suggests they are not powerful eno—$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Brother!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Huh?! What?!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Over here! Oof, can you believe that
dead tree just fell over when I leaned
on it. Strange, right! Almost...spooky.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Y-you look awfully tense, Alfonse...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|*ahem* Yes, well, I'm fine. And I'm
glad you are as well.$k$p$EFace|It seems the ghost you thought you
saw was just the shadow of that tree
in the moonlight, doesn't it...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Aww, so it wasn't a ghost, after all...$k$pBut that DOES make sense... Wow!
You're so smart!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Yes, well...if you simply apply a bit
of logic, everything becomes clear...$k$pPsst... $Nu...$k$pI may have lost my composure
somewhat earlier... Might I ask
you a favor?$k$pPlease...keep this little incident
between the two of us, all right?$k$p$Sbs150|
